mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rnum , a.stu_idx , a.part , a.stu_empl , a.stu_nm , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - CASE WHEN LEFT(a.stu_age, 2) > LEFT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), 2) THEN CONCAT('19', LEFT(a.stu_age, 2)) ELSE CONCAT('20', LEFT(a.stu_age, 2)) END +1 AS stu_age_real , a.stu_age , a.stu_phone , a.stu_email , a.stu_pict , a.use_yn , a.bigo , b.user_nm , c.cd_nm FROM student a LEFT JOIN member b ON a.stu_empl = b.user_id LEFT JOIN comm_cmncdm c ON a.part = c.cd_id, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1 AND a.part = #{part} AND a.stu_empl = #{stu_empl} ORDER BY rnum ASC LIMIT #{currentPerPage} OFFSET #{startIndex}
